file.content:
import Link from "next/link"; export default function About() { return (
{/* Header */}
New Blog! About

About Us

Welcome to New Blog! We're a team of passionate developers and writers dedicated to sharing knowledge about modern web development.

Founded in 2026, our mission is to make complex technical concepts accessible to developers of all skill levels. Whether you're just starting out or you're a seasoned professional, we have something for you.

What We Cover

  • React and Next.js tutorials
  • Modern CSS techniques
  • Full-stack development guides
  • Best practices and design patterns

Get In Touch

Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to us on Twitter or GitHub.

{/* Footer */}

© 2026 The Dev Blog. All rights reserved.

Twitter GitHub RSS
); }

import Link from "next/link"; export default function Resume() { return (
{/* Header */}
New Blog!
About Resume
{/* Name and Title */}

Alex Johnson

Senior Software Engineer

San Francisco, CA · alex.johnson@email.com · (555) 123-4567

{/* Summary */}

Summary

Experienced software engineer with 8+ years of expertise in full-stack development, specializing in React, Node.js, and cloud infrastructure. Passionate about building scalable, user-centric applications and mentoring junior developers.

{/* Experience */}

Experience

Senior Software Engineer

TechCorp Inc.

2021 - Present
  • Led development of a microservices architecture serving 2M+ daily users
  • Reduced API response times by 40% through optimization and caching strategies
  • Mentored a team of 5 junior developers

Software Engineer

StartupXYZ

2018 - 2021
  • Built and maintained the company's core React application
  • Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%
  • Collaborated with design team to improve UX consistency

Junior Developer

WebAgency Co.

2016 - 2018
  • Developed responsive websites for 20+ clients
  • Created reusable component libraries
{/* Skills */}

Skills

{[ "JavaScript", "TypeScript", "React", "Next.js", "Node.js", "Python", "PostgreSQL", "MongoDB", "AWS", "Docker", "Kubernetes", "GraphQL", "REST APIs", "Git", ].map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* Education */}

Education

B.S. Computer Science

University of California, Berkeley

2012 - 2016
{/* Footer */}

© 2026 The Dev Blog. All rights reserved.

Twitter GitHub RSS
); }

content.text:
Done. Made 4 updates:

1. **Resume page**: Changed name from "Alex Johnson" to "Alex Thompson"
2. **Resume page**: Added "Rust" to the skills list
3. **About page**: Changed "Founded in 2026" to "Founded in 2025"
4. **Main page**: Changed header title from "New Blog!" to "Tech Blog!"
